channel.title: Blog
channel.description:
Boon has been many places.
Have you?
BOON!

item.title: Reflections on the lake
item.description: I love hanging out in nature with my 17” steam punked Mac Book Pro with its huge SSD drive. It so silently compiles my code as I reflect on Classloaders and how I have to get rid of the remaining static references in my code base so it will work well in a web application.
